title: Stinkweed Imp
text: FlyingWhenever Stinkweed Imp deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature.Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly five cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)
expansion: Duel Decks Anthology, Divine vs. Demonic
